discussion.author: maximedenes
discussion.comment: @ybertot Cyril was asking about the naming. What's your take on it?

discussion.author: ybertot
discussion.comment: The naming seems reasonable to me.  There is no clash in the library (the KA combination has not been used before in lemma names) and the patterns used in the lemma come often in my own experience.

discussion.author: ggonthier
discussion.comment: `subrKA` could be generalised slightly by changing `- y` to `+ y` in the statement.

commits.author: CohenCyril
commits.message: Add addrKA and subrKA (addrK and addrNK modulo Associativity)
